duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide timely pickup and delivery of all lab supplies and lab packages.
Ensure lab orders are complete and organized prior to delivery.
Collaborate with staff to obtain the correct supplies and paperwork.
Adhere to delivery schedule and report to the hospital once deliveries are complete.
Perform daily cleaning of vehicle and maintain a vehicle maintenance log.
Pick orders, unload trucks, and put supplies away in the stockroom.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license with good driving history
